title: Applied Learning-Based Language Education Design for Online Vocational Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Project-based learning integrating theory and practice in real-world vocational settings for in-service vocational teachers or job seekers, utilizing collaboration tools and providing real-time feedback in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design language education modules using applied learning models in online environments.
Learners can develop interactive language tasks aligned with real-world vocational training scenarios.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of instructional design and suggest improvements through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
